updated_cases.title: Verify that whether we can disable the feature by mentioning staged_config.json.json file(applicable for all the tenants in that proxy)
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that whether we can disable the feature by mentioning staged_config.json.json file(applicable for all the tenants in that proxy)
updated_cases.custom_steps: Disable the feature details in staged_config.json file under /opt/ns/cfg/staged_config.json file
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Feature should be disabled for all the tenants even though tenant level flag is enabled
some things cannot be disabled once they are on (e.g. the listening modes).

updated_cases.title: Verify that whether proxy reads file dynamically(no restart required) staged_config.json file as when there is change in the file
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that whether proxy reads file dynamically(no restart required) staged_config.json file as when there is change in the file
updated_cases.custom_steps: Update staged_config.json file and check proxy reading the file as soon we update the file
updated_cases.custom_expected: Proxy should be watching the file and takes the update whenever there is a change

updated_cases.title: Verify that we can disable the feature globally even though the feature is enabled in the tenant feature config
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that we can disable the feature globally even though the feature is enabled in the tenant feature config
updated_cases.custom_steps: Disable the feature details in staged_config.json file under /opt/ns/cfg/staged_config.json file
updated_cases.custom_expected: Feature should be disabled for all the tenants even though tenant level flag is enabled

updated_cases.title: Verify that proxy does not crash/service won't be in Fatal state if the staged_config.json contains invalid json schema in it
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that proxy does not crash/service won't be in Fatal state if the staged_config.json contains invalid json schema in it
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Update some junk content in staged_config.json
check the proxy behavior
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Proxy  should ignore the changes if the json format is not correct
Also check that
1. that the other features move back to their respective defaults (when the proxy is restarted)
2. that the other features are un-effected (when this happens dynamically)
3. that we see a decent error message that helps us debug the induced issue

updated_cases.title: Verify that if we wont specify the pop in staged_config.json then the feature will not be  applicable for any of the proxies in all the DCs
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that if we wont specify the pop in staged_config.json then the feature will not be  applicable for any of the proxies in all the DCs
updated_cases.custom_steps: Add the feature details in staged_config.json file under /opt/ns/cfg/staged_config.json file without adding the pop details in it
updated_cases.custom_expected: Feature should get enabled in all the proxies and for any of the tenants

updated_cases.title: Verify that we restrict the feature to enable on certain DCs by mentioning pop name in staged_config.json file
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that we restrict the feature to enable on certain DCs by mentioning pop name in staged_config.json file
updated_cases.custom_steps: Add the feature details in staged_config.json file under /opt/ns/cfg/staged_config.json file add the pop details in it
updated_cases.custom_expected: Only in that particular DC the feature should be enabled

updated_cases.title: Verify that we restrict the feature to enable on certain Proxies in  DCs by mentioning pop name and hostname in staged_config.json file
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that we restrict the feature to enable on certain Proxies in  DCs by mentioning pop name and hostname in staged_config.json file
updated_cases.custom_steps: Add the feature details in staged_config.json file under /opt/ns/cfg/staged_config.json file add the pop and hostname details in it
updated_cases.custom_expected: Only in mentioned DC and proxy node feature should be enabled

updated_cases.title: Verify that we restrict the feature to enable on certain Proxies in multiple DCs by mentioning multiple pop name in staged_config.json file
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that we restrict the feature to enable on certain Proxies in multiple DCs by mentioning multiple pop name in staged_config.json file
updated_cases.custom_steps: Add the feature details in staged_config.json file under /opt/ns/cfg/staged_config.json file add the pop and hostname details in it
updated_cases.custom_expected: Only in mentioned DC and proxy node feature should be enabled

updated_cases.title: Verify that we can the feature to enable on all the Proxies in  in certain DCs by mentioning pop name and hostname in staged_config.json file
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that we can the feature to enable on all the Proxies in  in certain DCs by mentioning pop name and hostname in staged_config.json file
updated_cases.custom_steps: Add the feature details in staged_config.json file under /opt/ns/cfg/staged_config.json file add the pop and set site_global to true
updated_cases.custom_expected: Only in mentioned DC and proxy node feature should be enabled

updated_cases.title:
Verify that proxy wont feature won't get enabled/disabled  if we provide invalid values for the following fields which is under pop section in staged_config.json file 
Name
Hosts
site-global
updated_cases.custom_summary:
Verify that proxy wont feature won't get enabled/disabled  if we provide invalid values for the following fields which is under pop section in staged_config.json file 
Name
Hosts
site-global
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Add the feature details in staged_config.json file under /opt/ns/cfg/staged_config.json file 
add the invalid f pop and hostname format in it
updated_cases.custom_expected: Since the pop details are wrong feature should not get enabled in any machines
